snippet.title: Lazy Pirates - #GMTKJam2020 entry
snippet.description:
Available to play for free here: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2020/rate/699794 please rate it if you get the time 🙂

The theme was 'Out of Control', so we place you in control of a ship where your crew's morale dictates how likely they are to follow the commands you pick from your hand of command cards. Sail around, collect booty, blow up ships and towers, and most importantly, sing adorable sea shanties to keep their spirits high!

Follow the devs on twitter here:

https://twitter.com/DevFatigued

https://twitter.com/_Vollando

https://twitter.com/MarlyGames

You are a captain sailing a weirdly blocked off bit of ocean, beset on all sides by other pirates, fearsome watchtowers armed with cannons, and even the hazardous environment itself. 

Make the right choices to keep your crew's morale up so they'll continue to follow your orders - take too much punishment, and they'll be less likely to heed your commands at all.

Cheers for checking it out!
